body_html: turns out I did not need the std::bind(). We had made this change before nvidia support vs2015.update3 (we used vs2015.update1 until the official cuda 8.0 came out). Now that the std:bind() made trouble for gcc I started over on sparse_maxmul_op.cc and its fine without std:bind(): builds on linux and windows.
